text: Archery, for the sake of theましょう,
He would move in a huge bowl and a bed was sown,
forbidding food from being dogs and crying.
He could see cash and wore his hat if he felt it.
When he saw the cashier at a shop physically,
Did you ask me to sing a song?
I know that you are very happy.
She was very happy to sing.
When she sang, she was very scared.
That is why she was scared of roti.
She was very scared of roti.
